title: The tide has now turned as to house prices
dc:creator: NewDealdemocrat
description:
The tide has now turned as to house prices Last month I wrote that the FHFA showed evidence that house prices had peaked, and that â€œsince the FHFA has a tendency to turn slightly ahead of the Case Shiller index, this strongly suggests that a sharp deceleration in the Case Shiller index YoY will start […]
